Options.description: assign a name to the job
memory to use for this job, expressed in gigabytes
number of vcpus to use for this job
specify one or more inputs that will be used for the job using the following format: <DIR|DATASET_NAME>:<JOB_DIR>
specify one or more output folders that will be stored as datasets after the job is finished using the following format: <DATASET_NAME>:<JOB_DIR>
use this flag with a private image, a prompt will ask for your username and password.
type of configuration to use (from env, endpoint, or oidc)
file at which Nerd will look for Kubernetes credentials
